question: Gopal Das Neeraj, who passed away recently, was associated with which field?
explanation: Gopal Das Neeraj, the Doyen of Hindi poetry, has passed away in New Delhi on July 19, 2018. Neeraj, who was awarded Padma Shri (1991) and Padma Bhushan (2007), was born in Purvali village of Uttar Pradesh\'s Etawa district. He won 3 Filmfare awards and penned some of the all-time hits like Likhe jo khat tujhe. His works include: \'Dard Diya Hai\', \'Asawari\' \'Likh Likh Bhejat Pati\' and more.
